addVehicle: INSERT INTO Vehicle (make, model, color, km, location, value) VALUES (@Make,@Model,@Color,@KM,@Location,@Value)
getVehicle: SELECT Value FROM Vehicle WHERE VehicleID = @VehicleID
updateVehicle: UPDATE Vehicle SET Make = @Make, Model = @Model, Color = @Color, KM = @KM, Location = @Location, Value = @Value WHERE VehicleID = @VehicleID
